about_the_game:
A first-person shooter set in Chicago, 1926


The mob has been dabbling in biological experiments and mechanical implants. After uncovering details during an investigation you are ambushed and setup. Now there is BAD BLOOD between you... and its payback time!

Visceral gameplay, involving stealth mechanics, silent takedowns, gun fights and puzzles come together into a glorious whole as you follow Franklin on his investigation. As he uncovers more about the sinister plot and the enemies he is up against, he will acquire powers as a result of the mob's experimentation, facing new enemies with similar enhancements. These enhancements might allow you to traverse the world with super speed to complete your objectives faster, or tank up with super strength to tilt the balance of combat in your favour.

Graphics based on noir graphic novels and 1920s art deco help to create a beautiful, rich world to explore, creating a unique visual style unlike anything seen before, providing a sinister mood and dark atmosphere, capturing the spirit of the criminal underworld of the 1920s.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, gore and violent deaths as part of first person shooter combat

short_description: 1926, Chicago. The mob has been dabbling in bio-organic experiments and mechanical implants. In this first person shooter, you play as a federal agent tasked with taking them down! Visceral gameplay, mutational genetics and cybernetic enhancements come together in a fresh take on the genre.
